title: Singleton Pattern in Entity Framework
ques:
Hi, 

Does anyone know if there is a place where I can use the Singleton Pattern in the Entity Framework?

answers.ans:
With all due respect, I think the question has it all reversed. Instead of asking: I have a nail, how do I get it into the wall, you are asking: I have a hammer, what I can beat with it?

So, my question is: do you have a particular problem with the Entity Framework that needs a solution?

My 2 cents.
